mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipeseq(recipeseqno, recipeno, memberno, contents, file_seq, thumb_seq, size_seq, step, recipeseqseqno) VALUES(recipeseq_seq.nextval, #{recipeno}, #{memberno}, #{contents}, #{file_seq}, #{thumb_seq}, #{size_seq}, #{step}, #{recipeseqseqno})
mapper.select: SELECT recipeseqno, recipeno, memberno, contents, file_seq, thumb_seq, size_seq, step, recipeseqseqno FROM recipeseq WHERE recipeno = #{recipeno} ORDER BY step ASC
